sentences: After nearly two weeks of intensive deliberations, many felt deflated as, on day 10 of the COP, the ADP seemed to lose momentum, with over 50 pages of bracketed text and no agreement on the way forward in sight.
A mysterious draft decision document, which made a brief appearance on the ADP website in the morning, circulated broadly among delegates.

Lost between the several pages of this draft text and the 50+ pages of the Co-Chairs' draft containing all alternative proposals made by parties, many questioned Lima's ability to build bridges to Paris.
Yet, some wondered if, somewhere in there, the contours of the Lima outcome had started to become visible.
Inspired by the positive spirit of the morning high-level meeting on climate action, one delegate mused: 'maybe, like the Nazca Lines, we just need to climb up the hill to see the full picture'.
With the likelihood of a sleepless night dawning on the delegates, many felt that the clear direction given by the COP/CMP President had inspired them to climb up the steep hill ahead.
